product_name: Maui Jim Makaha Reader Polarized Sunglasses
long_description: Maui Jim Makaha Readers polarized sunglasses protect your eyes from the savage rays and glare of the sun. Great for reading at the beach or in the sun, sunglasses feature built-in bifocal lenses. Rugged polycarbonate bifocal lenses optimize your distance vision and clarify objects close in. For close-in vision, choose from one of these powers: +1.50, +2.00 and +2.50. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Front and back of lenses feature a Clearshell(R) hard coating that provides excellent scratch resistance. Extremely impact-resistant, Grilamid TR 90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Rimless semirectangular frame shape hugs the head and complements many face sizes. Rubber nose pads and temple ends prevent slippage. Anti-corrosive nickel/silver hinges. Maui Jim Makaha sunglasses come with a semi-rigid case and a soft pouch for cleaning and storage. Smoke grey frames have gray lenses to provide contrast and high light reduction suitable for all light conditions, especially bright, direct sunlight. Tortoise frames have bronze lenses to provide excellent contrast and high light reduction suitable for all light conditions, especially bright, direct sunlight.
